TopicTitle: Twitch Thursday: Random fun in RSS by ShimmyTheJJ

Articles.Content: <figure data-orig-width="480" data-orig-height="92" class="tmblr-full"><img data-orig-width="480" data-orig-height="92" src="http://41.media.tumblr.com/e6b9796e0425d604ccf4dd4df2733721/tumblr_inline_ntqy5eSpv21rr2wit_540.jpg"/></figure><p><br/><object bgcolor="#000000" data="http://www.twitch.tv/swflibs/TwitchPlayer.swf" height="378" id="clip_embed_player_flash" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="620"><param name="movie" value="http://www.twitch.tv/swflibs/TwitchPlayer.swf"><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"><param name="allowNetworking" value="all"><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"><param name="flashvars" value="channel=shimmythejj&auto_play=false&start_volume=25&videoId=v12787935&device_id=2ce7c9e92329b818"></object><br/></p><p>You can always count on ShimmyTheJJ to set the perfect atmosphere for a relaxed game of #KSP. He’ll gladly answer your questions or continue flying his missions to the calm tones of classical music. And his beard is simply magnificent.</p>
#Audio for portions of this video have been muted due to copyright restrictions...
Why do people only comment on Devnote Tuesdays? It perplexes me...

Why do people only comment on Devnote Tuesdays? It perplexes me...
Mainly because DTs are the most interesting part of the week, and it applies to everyone. Twtich generally only appeals to a few people per episode.
Good point, I still read everything. I think we all do but just never comment. On a relevant note, I really like Shimmy, he is great at Kerbal.

I never look at any video posted here, ever. Click to see what it's about, ignore. Reading is far more information dense than having to watch some lousy video for howver long (assuming you are someplace where you can even watch a video).

I never look at any video posted here, ever. Click to see what it's about, ignore. Reading is far more information dense than having to watch some lousy video for howver long (assuming you are someplace where you can even watch a video).

I wondered myself if there was anyone who watched them. I`ll look at devnotes, maybe modding monday but rarely anything else.
I like Modding Mondays, I got Kerbal Planetary Base Systems, I love that mod. So cool! That's also where I saw lots of other cool mods.
